description.name: usdclinea
description.tagline: USDC Linea Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto linea-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USDC Linea directly on your website
Unique linea/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your linea/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
